attributes.action: Make national childrens right's day 20th November, a National holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 20th of November, is national children's rights day, and we at the youth division feel that it should be a national holiday,

We are going to Downing Street on the 20th to hand in this petition and 2 others, please support us,
